title: Women representation in law firms
summary: This statistic shows the Percentage of representation law in the Women in , sorted firms .
According to the source , 65 percentage of female students in the Women were firms as of 2013 .
There were a total of 1,780 commercial Women law in the firms in 2015 , a slight increase from the 1,753 in 2005 .
gold: The chart compares the percentage of female representation across different sectors . Whilst insurance and tech sectors are leading the charge at over 60 % , law firms are farther behind around 35 % .
